mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_type, parent_id, permission_path, icon, description, status, sort_order, remark, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_code = #{permissionCode} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.permission_type, p.parent_id, p.permission_path, p.icon, p.description, p.status, p.sort_order, p.remark, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC

SELECT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.permission_type, p.parent_id, p.permission_path, p.icon, p.description, p.status, p.sort_order, p.remark, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_type = 'menu' AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.permission_type, p.parent_id, p.permission_path, p.icon, p.description, p.status, p.sort_order, p.remark, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.permission_type = 'menu' AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC

WITH RECURSIVE permission_tree AS ( -- 查询根权限 SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE parent_id = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1 UNION ALL -- 递归查询子权限 SELECT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.permission_type, p.parent_id, p.permission_path, p.icon, p.description, p.status, p.sort_order, p.remark, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.create_by, p.update_by, p.is_deleted FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN permission_tree pt ON p.parent_id = pt.id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND p.status = 1 ) SELECT * FROM permission_tree ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_type = #{permissionType} AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_code IN #{permissionCode} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_code = #{permissionCode} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_role_permission rp INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id WHERE rp.permission_id = #{permissionId} AND r.is_deleted = 0
